full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,DNGOS GRUB KUN 'BYUNG SKYA RENGS DKAR PO ZHES BYA BA NI, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @009B (DNGOS GRUB KUN 'BYUNG SKYA RENGS DKAR PO ZHES BYA BA 'DI NAS MCHOD 'GROG AE MCHI BKA' BCU PA DANG, NGAG DBANG BSTAN 'DZIN GNYIS KYIS GZHAN LA PHAN BSAM GYIS SOG YUL 'DI GAR ME LHA MCHOD CING GA-YANG BLANG BAS BKRA SHIS PA 'BYUNG 'DUG KYANG LHA BSKYED PA MCHOD PA'I BYIN RLABS SOGS MED PA'I SOG YIG TSIG LHANG CAN GYI LUGS 'DZIN 'GA' SNANG MOD, RANG RE LA LHA BSKYED PA'I ME MCHOD ZHIG BYED DGOS ZHES BSKUL BA'I NGO MO CHOG PAR SBYIN PAR BSREG GI THAB BSKYED PA DANG, SLOB DPON PADMA'I GA-YANG 'GUGS CHEN PO'I GA-YANG 'GUGS BYED KYI TSIG 'GA' ZHIG BSDUS NAS RAB 'BYAMS PA NGAG DBANG BSOD NAMS KYIS GA-YANG KHRAL DU DBANG PHYUG ZHES ME GLANG GI LO'I HOR ZLA BCU PA'I TSES BZANG BAR 'GRIG @10A *, ,PA'O, , 'DI LTAR BGYIS PA'I NOS PA'I CHA MCHIM NA, ,BLA MA LHA LA BSHAGS SHING BZOD PAR GSOL, ,LEGS CHA CUNG ZAD MCHIS PAS GANG THOB GNAS, ,'GRO BA RNAMS LA PHAN PA'I RGYUR GYUR CIG ,)
